title: Usb-C to 3.5 mm audio converter
content:
The Usb-C to 3.5 mm audio converter in my Pixel 2xl seems to be not working properly. While listening to music, the music seems to stop abruptly making some crackling noise, after which I have restart the app to get back the music. I am using a Bose Soundsport  earbud with my Pixel 2xl.

Did ant of you face issues with the Usb-C to 3.5 mm audio converter?
